Comment: No. The supreme Court did not order him to return Garcia. They said facilitate. It was vague enough that it allowed both sides to claim they won a 9-0 victory. Notice how SCOTUS had been silent about it since it's ruling?  They very easily could make it clear to everyone what they meant, but they haven't/won't. But that's why they ordered the lower court to explain what she meant by effectuate.
